metrics_conclusion: Rotterdam (Or Anywhere) has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Rotterdam (Or Anywhere) is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
